data.title: REVIEW Dragonflight by Anne McCaffrey ⭐️⭐️⭐️ . I really enjoyed reading this book. The writing style is very easy to read and therefore I...
data.meta_description:
194 likes, 4 comments - the_queen_of_reading on March 11, 2024: "REVIEW
Dragonflight by Anne McCaffrey
⭐️⭐️⭐️
.
I really enjoyed reading this book. The writing style is very easy to read and therefore I didn’t struggle getting into this book even though I was in a reading slump before starting it. 

At first, I was expecting this book to be very predictable. However, what I liked the most about this novel is that it kept surprising me. There were lots of plot twists that I absolutely didn’t see coming and that made the reading experience very exciting.

However, there were a few things that I didn’t like as much. The main problem of this book is that the pacing is a bit off. Some  important things happen really fast or even off-camera/page, but then some scenes are unnecessarily long. The whole way the book is told feels a bit superficial. That made it especially difficult to connect to the characters and took some excitement away from important moments. But overall, I still had a good time with this book and am very greatful that it helped me overcome my reading slump.
.
Which are your favorite dragon books? 
.
.
.
.
